ci_server_conf Struct Reference
[c-icap server configuration API]

This struct holds the basic configurations of c-icap server. More...

#include <cfg_param.h>

Detailed Description

This struct holds the basic configurations of c-icap server.

It passed as argument to services and modules inititalization functions

Do not use directly this struct but better use the documended macros and functions

Examples:

services/echo/srv_echo.c.

The documentation for this struct was generated from the following file:
